name: Grabbed
content: You’re held in place by another creature, giving you the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} conditions. If you attempt a manipulate action while grabbed, you must succeed at a DC 5 flat check or it is lost; roll the check after spending the action, but before any effects are applied.
